name: Prometheus (danixoon, djkreyz)
description:
Bring the Light to the Colony!

Tutorial:

The goal - fill the light bar to maximum. Build generators near sun to gain light and near crystals to buy cells before your colony is goes into the V̸͎̹̯̬̈̂̒͂̑̄Ơ̸̢̨̧͈̟̟͉̦̲̻̞̭̫̖͌͐̄̍̓̽́̄̑͋̚Į̴̟̜͖̣͎̦̩̟̦̭̩̀͂̑̽̾̏̌̿̓̌͜͝͝D̷̢̼̮̯̎͊̐͑͑̄̀̈̍̌̽̾.

Controls:

  • LMB - Buy a cell / mount a generator
  • RMB - Unmount a generator
  • WASD - A camera movement
  • Mouse Wheel - Scale
  • Left Shift - Boost a camera movement

Features:

  • 7 levels of unique challenges
  • Variety of strategies
  • Cool pixel art graphics

Tips: 

  • Place two generators together & they will be mining two times faster!

Contributors: 

  • danixoon - Programming and Game design
  • djkreyz - Sound, Art, Game design

Prometheus is a casual strategy maid in 20 hours for Weekly Game Jam - Week 236 with the theme «Cities»
